mapper.select: SELECT PHOTO_SEQ as "seq" FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PHOTO ORDER BY PHOTO_DATE DESC, PHOTO_TIME DESC, PHOTO_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: /* 사진 추가하기*/ INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_PHOTO ( PHOTO_FILENM, PHOTO_PATHNM, PHOTO_THUMB, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_DESC, PHOTO_LOC, PHOTO_DATE, PHOTO_TIME, PHOTO_TAG, PHOTO_DEVICE, PHOTO_LIKECNT ) VALUES ( #{filename}, #{pathname}, #{thumbnail}, #{name}, #{desc}, #{location}, #{date}, #{time}, #{tag}, #{device}, #{likeCnt} )
mapper.update: /* 사진 수정하기*/ UPDATE TB_CHANGOOS_PHOTO SET PHOTO_FILENM = #{filename}, PHOTO_PATHNM = #{pathname}, PHOTO_THUMB = #{thumbnail}, PHOTO_NAME = #{name}, PHOTO_DESC = #{desc}, PHOTO_LOC = #{location}, PHOTO_DATE = #{date}, PHOTO_TIME = #{time}, PHOTO_TAG = #{tag}, PHOTO_DEVICE = #{device}, PHOTO_LIKECNT = #{likeCnt} WHERE PHOTO_SEQ = #{seq}
